programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: Un día que comenzó con un paseo escolar al campo terminó con la peor pesadilla para los padres. Una niña de once años había desaparecido. Sus padres estaban seguros de que no se trataba de una huida.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Marisa vive con angustia, a la espera de la llamada de los secuestradores para exigir sus condiciones. A pesar de seguir las coordenadas, la policía no se espera los planes de Estanislao. Pero aparece alguien con la clave para el rescate.

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Sara, desesperada por acabar con su enemiga, tendrá el destino que jamás imaginó. El camino queda libre para llevar adelante los proyectos prometidos en la campaña del senador Parker y, en especial, el que unirá para siempre a Marisa y a Cristóbal.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler

programme.title: Marido en alquiler
programme.desc: Griselda acepta la propuesta de casamiento de Gabriel delante de José y le pide a su ex que se marche y no vuelva más. José se hace la víctima y pone su destino en manos de sus hijos. Susana se mete en la computadora de Rafael y descubre cosas.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Aurora

programme.title: Aurora

programme.title: Aurora

programme.title: Aurora

programme.title: Aurora

programme.desc: Marty notices that ToonVille always resets. The trio goes nuts and leaves ToonVille a wasteland. But when Jack dies and ToonVille doesn't reset, Marty has to put ToonVille back. Is it his only hope of bringing Jack back?

programme.title: Toon Marty
programme.desc: When Marty gets tagged “It” he thinks it's a great honour and a fun game. When he finds out that in ToonVille IT is a life-threatening disease, he and Burnie must find the Wise Tree to figure out how to get rid of it.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Optimus Prime assigns the Dinobots to guard a meteorite that contains new and unknown energy. Appealing to Grimlocks' simple arrogance, Megatron convinces the Dinobots to attack Optimus Prime and betray the Autobots.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 1 of 3. With help from a human scientist, the Decepticons enslave people through mind control to fight against the Autobots and generate enough power for Megatron's sinister plan: bringing Cybertron into Earth's orbit to steal all of its energy.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 2 of 3. With Cybertron now in orbit, the Earth is being torn apart by geological forces and natural disasters. A small Autobot team heads to Cybertron to stop Megatron, while the rest of the Autobots try to protect Earth. But is it already too late?

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 3 of 3. On Cybertron, Spike and the small band of Autobots attempt to sabotage the Decepticons’ hypno-chip and free the people of Earth. Meanwhile, Optimus Prime and the remaining Autobots on Earth continue to try to save the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 3 of 3. On Cybertron, Spike and the small band of Autobots attempt to sabotage the Decepticons' hypno-chip and free the people of Earth. Meanwhile, Optimus Prime and the remaining Autobots on Earth continue to try to save the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Deep in the “Demon Swamp” on the island of Bali, large robotic insects are eating everything in their path and terrorizing the islanders. Megatron realizes they are an ancient breed of Decepticons, and forms an alliance with these powerful Insecticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: As Optimus Prime and Megatron prepare to face off in a duel, Megatron secretly plots to unleash the latest addition to his Decepticon army—the Constructicons – along with Devastator, a Decepticon unlike any the Autobots have ever seen before!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: When Spike is wounded and knocked unconscious in a Decepticon attack, Sparkplug and Wheeljack reluctantly transfer his consciousness into their experimental robot, Autobot X, to save him.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: With Wheeljacks' newest invention, The Immobilizer, any object in motion can be frozen. Although it may prove valuable in the fight against evil, it may also prove too dangerous to exist…especially once Megatron gets his hands on it.

programme.title: Números

programme.title: Números
